ARABIC: أَمْ حَسِبَ ٱلَّذِينَ فِى قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٌ أَن لَّن يُخْرِجَ ٱللَّهُ أَضْغَٰنَهُمْ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Or did those with sickness in their hearts imagine that Allah would not expose their malevolence?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Do they whose minds are filled with doubt, think that God will not expose their malice?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Or do they, in whose hearts there is a sickness, believe that Allah will not bring their failings to light?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Do those whose hearts are sick think that God will never make their malice public?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: What! Do they, in whose hearts is a disease, fancy that Allah will not expose concealed enmities?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Or do those in whose hearts is a disease, think that Allah will not expose their ill--wills
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Or do those in whose hearts is a disease think that Allah will not bring forth their spite?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Or did those in whose hearts is sickness think that God would not bring to light their rancour?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Or do those in whose hearts is a disease deem that Allah will not bring to light their (secret) hates?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Do the sick at heart imagine that God will not bring to light their malice?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Deem those in whose hearts is a disease that Allah will never bring to light their secret malevolence?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Do those in whose hearts is a sickness suppose that Allah will not expose their spite?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Or do those in whose hearts is a disease, think that Allah will not bring to light all their rancour?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Or do those in whose hearts is a disease (of hypocrisy), think that Allah will not bring to light all their hidden ill-wills?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Or, do those who have a disease in their hearts think that Allah will not reveal their hatred?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Do those in whose hearts is sickness think that God will not expose their malice?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Or do those in whose hearts is disease think that Allah would never expose their [feelings of] hatred?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [47:29] Or did those in whose hearts is a sickness suppose that God would not expose their rancour?, [that] He would [not] bring to light their spite against the Prophet (s) and the believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Or do those in whose hearts is a disease) doubt and hypocrisy (deem that Allah will not bring to light their (secret) hates) and enmity towards Allah and His Messenger; and it is also said that this means: did they think that Allah will not bring to light their hypocrisy, enmity and hatred for the believers to know?
